alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 11:07AM MST until January 05 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches above 2000 feet. A light dusting to 1 inch is expected below 2000 feet. * WHERE...Elk City, Elk River, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Lolo Pass, Dixie, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Pierce, and Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters. * WHEN...From 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ this evening to 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
